tool.name: GenomicConsensus Arrow
tool.description: algorithm to compute genomic consensus and call variants using PacBio reads mapped to a reference.
tool.command:
## filenames
#set reference_fn = 'reference.' + $referenceFilename.ext ln -s '$referenceFilename' '$reference_fn' &&
#set fa_index_fn = $reference_fn + '.fai' ln -s '$fa_index' '$fa_index_fn' &&
#set input_fn = 'input.' + $input.ext ln -s '$input' '$input_fn' &&
#set pbi_fn = $input_fn + '.pbi' ln -s '$pbi' '$pbi_fn' &&
## variantCaller
variantCaller --numWorkers \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --referenceFilename '$reference_fn' --outputFilename output.fa '$input_fn'
tool.help:
**What it does**
Compute genomic consensus and call variants relative to the reference.
